"A.P.242/3/20/11:00": "Have you calmed down, Luco?"
"...Now speak. What took place on that day five years ago?"
"While on a mission, I discovered an old mansion on the outskirts of the residential area. It was a splendid building, and uninhabited."
"I decided to invite the two of you there, to entertain you as guests."
"So I wrote out the invitation to both of you, asking only that you come to the mansion... I left out the reason, to keep it a surprise."
"Then, on the day of the meeting... I entered the mansion through the rear entrance, in order to remain hidden."
"Upon doing so... Numerous traps were activated!"
"Before I could even resist, I was knocked unconscious... And then dragged away by someone."
"So I do not know what occurred in the mansion after that. For when I awoke next..."
"I was on Planet Wopal, though it was not yet officially known at the time. I found myself in a Void research facility on the seafloor."
"There, I was made to fight modified lifeforms endlessly, as part of their Darker Factor experiments..."
"Void...?! They were supposed to have been dismantled three years ago. What happened to you after that...?"
"The battle data collection was completely automated. The experiments remained operational even after their dissolution. I fought and fought, right up until I was rescued..."
"Maria of the Council of Six discovered the facility while searching Wopal, and liberated me."
"However... I had been fighting the creatures used in their experiments that whole time."
"When they discovered me, my body had already absorbed a dreadful quantity of Darker Factor."
"N-No way...!"
"Maria informed me that I had very nearly turned into a Darker myself, that I would not have made it had she been any later."
"Gh... Why! Why did they subject you to that...!"
"...During my work as a maid, I learned of Void's inhumane experiments, and began to investigate them independently."
"They became aware of me at some point... Deeming me a hindrance to their plans, I was targeted."
"They must have locked you two in the mansion and set fire to it in order to destroy any evidence of their presence..."
"I was not the only one to suffer. You two were placed in a grave situation as well..."
"I am truly... very sorry..."
"Don't be! Everything was Void's fault! You didn't do anything wrong!"
"Then why did you not make any attempt to contact us after you were rescued? What have you been doing all this time?"
"My corruption levels were dangerously high, even for ARKS to handle... Or so Maria believed."
"However, there was a small chance I could be saved... They decided to take that risk. Master, do you know what I speak of?"
"Cold Sleep...?"
"Taking it easy...?"
"Correct... It was the Cold Sleep that you also made use of."
"N-No! It was the Cold Sleep that you also made use of."
"...I am told the technology was still under development, but used off the record to purge the Darker Factor."
"Tch... So even after your rescue, your fate remained uncertain as you lay dormant within darkness to recover...?"
"Correct. The Cold Sleep functioned perfectly... After three years, my purification was completed."
"After awakening, I went through rehabilitation with the intent to reunite with you..."
"But... a sudden fear gripped me."
"...Fear? Of what?"
"That you would reject me... one who was corrupted by the Darkers."
"But that was merely my own cowardice... Stratos has always told me, \"Luco is Luco\"."
"So ends my story. Could you ever find it in your hearts to forgive me?"
"Of course! You haven't done anything wrong! We don't hate you at all, right Kyo?"
"Yes... You overcame the great \"fear\" sleeping within the depths of your own heart."
"And you trusted us... you provided an explanation devoid of falsehoods... I have no complaints."
"Thank you..."
"Once again... welcome back, Luco!"
"...Thank you! Stratos, and Kyo!"
"Hey now, you apologize too, Kyo! You said all those horrible things to Luco!"
"Hmph... I was merely offering my hospitality, to lead you to a reconciliation."
"Oh, your hospitality?! But how splendid!"
"You sought to bring an even greater happiness to others."
"You sought to ease the pain and suffering of others."
"Only someone who truly understands the spirit of hospitality and is able to carry it out... is fit to be called a Maid."
"Do not be dismayed, Kyo... the role was made for you!"
"...You are a fool."
"That's right, Luco. Kyo's a guy, so he'd be man-maid!"
"You too are a fool!"
"Hey, c'mon Kyo! Only a fool calls someone else a fool!"
"Now now... Let us all don our maidly garb, and shower everyone in our hospitality!"
"No!"
"No way!"
"Hehe... Master. Thank you for all of your help."
"Because of you, we have another chance. A chance to rebuild our friendship...!"
